question:
Assignment 3 Questions. Hello,

If we are able to do half of the solution right for assignment 3, will we get partial marks, or will it be zero (since computer checks the answers)?

Thank you
Instructor Answer: Partial marks -- a big part of our testing is testing functions individually. So while there are marks for the full solution, there are also marks for progress in terms of finishing some functions.
